attributes.action: send all British residents, who hold a full driving licence, a copy of the Highway Code, free of charge, as and when it is published.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to reduce road traffic offences and in order to make Britain's roads safer it would be desirable for all drivers to be aware of the contents of the latest edition of the Highway Code. The best way to achieve this would be to send every British resident, who holds a current full driving licence, a free copy of the Highway Code. This would prove to be cost effective in the long term due to a reduction in serious injuries caused by road traffic accidents.
